fields.name: userActivated
fields.title: Activated
fields.description: Indicates whether a user is activated or not.

fields.name: badPasswordTime
fields.title: Bad Password Time
fields.description: The last time and date that an attempt to log on to this account was made with a password that is not valid.

fields.name: expirationDate
fields.title: Expiration Date
fields.description: The time and date when these credentials will be expired and need to be changed.

fields.name: badPasswordCount
fields.title: Bad Password Count
fields.description: The number of times the user tried to log on to the account using an incorrect password.

fields.name: pwdLastSet
fields.title: Password Last Set
fields.description: Indicates whether a use must change password at next logon.
